subject: Rsync
body:
Sorry for the banal question...the debian cd syncing though rsync, does it also delete files if they are not found on the source mirror?I mean, rsync synchronizes files from the source or purely downloads new stuff?
thanksJohn (ac3bf1 - mirror.ac3bf1.org)-- /******************www.ac3bf1.org
